title: Antigravity vs Gemini 3 Pro: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Gemini 3 Pro. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Gemini 3 Pro? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Gemini 3 Pro
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2026 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2026 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. Users choose it for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code
Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

verdict: Both Antigravity and Gemini 3 Pro are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Gemini 3 Pro for llm.
